item.title: HackTheBox - Busqueda Writeup
item.description: Nmap Like always, I’m going to scan the IP Address by using nmap but I’m going to scan the full port first. Then, I’m going to scan the only open ports. nmap -p22,80 -sCV -oN nmap/busqueda 10.10.11.208 PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 22/tcp open ssh OpenSSH 8.9p1 Ubuntu 3ubuntu0.1 (Ubuntu Linux; protocol 2.0) | ssh-hostkey: | 256 4f:e3:a6:67:a2:27:f9:11:8d:c3:0e:d7:73:a0:2c:28 (ECDSA) |_ 256 81:6e:78:76:6b:8a:ea:7d:1b:ab:d4:36:b7:f8:ec:c4 (ED25519) 80/tcp open http Apache httpd 2.4.52 |_http-server-header: Apache/2.4.52 (Ubuntu) |_http-title: Did not follow redirect to http://searcher.
